item.description:
Join NHC'er Josh at the Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at the Heirloom Restaurant of the Study Hotel in New Haven. This event is being hosted by The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section, and runs from 5:30 PM to 8:00 PM.

This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

The Study will be providing free beer and wine for the 1st hour and drink specials will be provided for the rest of the evening. The Study will also be providing free appetizers to all attendees.

Josh will be attending the event and can be contacted at (203)772-0070 if anyone has any questions.
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at the Study Hotel
